snippet: The evolving political dynamics of Detroit mean that the flurry of campaigning happens in a city where elected officials no longer have final say.
abstract: Evolving political dynamics of Detroit mean that the flurry of campaigning for mayoral race is happening in city where elected officials no longer have final say; Detroit's city operations are now under control of state-appointed emergency manager, part of efforts to fix city's beleaguered finances.
lead_paragraph: The evolving political dynamics of Detroit mean that the flurry of campaigning happens in a city where elected officials no longer have final say.

headline.main: With Detroit Under State Control, Candidates Seek Posts Stripped of Power
headline.print_headline: With Detroit Under State Control, Candidates Seek Posts Stripped of Power
